documents.document: @rollo75 @the_howie now *that* I can understand.
@rollo75 @the_howie I stand corrected. They both do. Which is even more insane.
@rollo75 @the_howie it's CTP!
@jkhowie you will once @PapaSabotage and I spend more time educating you... :)
@the_howie @NRMA @GIOInsurance yeah I felt it was going to be that. Look, if it was $50, I probably wouldn't care. But $180?! Come on....
Hey @NRMA, 15yrs of being with you count for nothing? You sent us a CTP renewal for almost $200 more thanâ€¦ https://t.co/YlQW4vHLUe

@lyndaal there was an issue with SMSs going to the wrong recipients today. So chances are it wasn't for you :-/
Annnnnd SMSs are back - as my phone, won't stop buzzing.
Not a good day to forget to take my work ID off before I hop on the train...
.@leslienassar would be having a field day with all this, and without a doubt, he'd be making us laugh lots.
Such an amazing adventure & experience. Highly recommended! https://t.co/G5TSMWgzK9
It's going to be a long afternoon :( https://t.co/cQzKYkLr1m
@trevorlong call / network routing is a complex beast! But also like you mentioned in your last tweet, congestion's going to be affecting it
Train trip this morning was spent watching Stop Laughing... This Is Serious on @abciview. So very, very good!
@freshjc Hey John, any view on when TSH might open up to IFTTT integration at all? So keen for it... :)
This makes me want to consider a last minute, unplanned trip to #B12hr even more........ https://t.co/ZdrKiBvJB3

Very cool. https://t.co/NR9SdYKCbD
@RockItLikeARedH I bought it as part of your 6-pack varitety box. So much goodness in one box! Can't wait to try it out. :) ace job!
@jkhowie Eliza looks like she's in heaven with that dolls house...
I can't believe how soft the penalties are here. "Here's a tiny fine, and a letter saying 'naughty naughty'. We'llâ€¦ https://t.co/ULsW2BF8n3
A real Portugal port from @RockItLikeARedH that my @NakedWinesAus support helped fund. This is gonna taste so damnâ€¦ https://t.co/LFdu6iiqzo
Australia Day! Enjoying some fantastic Australian music, before BBQ and #Hottest100 goodness later this morn. https://t.co/pwbT1gAryt
@mrstiedt @debs_noble another friend suggested having it on weetbix for breakfast.
@mrstiedt @debs_noble haha all these awesome combos are coming out since I posted that, and Debbie isn't coping. :)
Saw this number plate on a car the other day. I guess "WANKER" was already taken. https://t.co/JWmhqTM3qg
@nectar_club negatory. It was Cisco's new Nth Syd office. Only pod coffee on offer ðŸ˜­
Yeah so this isn't a bad spot for a long meeting. https://t.co/ijkoci3fve
Listening to some @ThePorkersBand - been so long. Such brilliant ska/punk tunes & memories. Must see them again, @bjd. #NowPlaying
Been up nice & early catching some of the @RaceOfChampions. Always incredible racing from the best in the world.
@chriswaghorn @the_howie @jkhowie reckon you'd cry too much?
@the_howie poor form from you.
@the_howie there was a good joke there about how I work on reverse time in lieu, and how this is making up for me 2pm finish times.
@the_howie phhfffttt. No such thing for me!
@jkhowie @chriswaghorn @the_howie but way way better than all of them.
@ChrissieM me too. Maybe tomorrow..... I hope! It's worse when the client is so nice about it all - makes me feel worse!
Think I'm going to be hovering over my phone & emails all weekend. Le sigh.
Oh what a night. Disaster of a network build at 4:30pm on a Fri for a customer who was supposed to be doing a data centre move this w'end.
@chriswaghorn @jkhowie serious?!? Nah, it's 2000. Hilarious movie. Cartoon. Great voices.
Seriously, how is Emperor's New Groove not the #1 Disney movie ever. It's so brilliant.
@mrtiedt I would bet that neither does anyone else. Latham has gone super weirdo since leaving politics. IMHO.
"Almond milk bottles would be dairy free and three times the price of regular milk bottles." https://t.co/EhkEznVwSt
This is pretty funny. https://t.co/FVICTJ3b8e
@the_howie *sigh* why don't we just pack our two families up and finally move over to Wellington??
@the_howie But NZ politics is probably far less tainted & untrusted than ours has become over the last decade.
@the_howie yeah. I wonder how NZ viewed John Key's retirement... whether people thought he might've screwed up.
@the_howie As for me, I want to trust him, but I'm thinking pretty much the same as you.
@the_howie Yep. That tweet was just a general statement about us viewing politicians.
We've become so normalised by politicians screwing up that we struggle to accept that Baird might be actually retirâ€¦ https://t.co/DiYzANp3pT
@yopetemate Yeah........ like I said, I didn't completely agree with everything he said/did :)
I definitely didn't agree with everything he did, but he was probably the best leader NSW has had in a long time. Aâ€¦ https://t.co/5JKocQXGtT
About to get a very heavy heart. #Granville ðŸŒ¹ðŸŒ¹ https://t.co/9OPa37X1H6
@slezzels @jkhowie that sucks :( Makes me even more thankful for the open-ness of our front room for southerlies.
@jkhowie @slezzels Our houses must be very different. All doors and windows open here, and it's bordering on too cold for shorts & t-shirt.
@jkhowie close enough.... happy now? https://t.co/GTnlT8ZUOL
Eek. Pretty sure those sirens I can here out my front window are a heap of fire trucks racing up Pennant Hills Rd tâ€¦ https://t.co/jgdri99epi
@jkhowie look, it's not 38Â°, and there's a breeze. I call that a win.
Oh boy oh boy oh boy... impatient for 2017 @supercars goodness already. https://t.co/Nsr6zipFDj
So had never heard of kasundi before... and was given a jar of tomato kasundi for Christmas...... O_O my new favourite thing.
So we only had to get through the morning to deal with that Sydney heat! It's almost bearable outside now.
.@debs_noble & I are planning on watching the incredible Day of the Roses tonight. ðŸŒ¹ ðŸŒ¹ https://t.co/rRjQeGK069
Debbie just pulled out Ferris Bueller's Day Off. Such a brilliant movie!
@willie1foot haha yep, that guy has been trolling for a couple of years now. Have you not come across him before?
Need to do a chunk of reading this morn, so this seems the perfect place. #FossixCoffee https://t.co/1wqU7ATGMF
@jkhowie those arms.
#LastRT Seriously, @guardian... do some fact checking before you publish stupid claims about backdoors!
Early morning, back to the office. I declare today, email sorting day. (And coffee drinking day.)
@the_howie @bjd oh my goodness, I hope you're right.....
@the_howie all good, they ship in 24 hours, as we found out! Order now and it'll be there for when you get back from Melbs!
@bjd it's so lovely. Now, how the hell do you cool a bottle down faster than a freezer?!
My, isn't this just the most beautiful thing to arrive home to (cc. @bjd). https://t.co/6b84HjkCqK
Home! A glorious ~2800km driven, and the last big trip for the Commodore before it gets swapped for an Outback.
Filling of all of us with pies completed. So close to home now - hour and a half; 144km.
Port Macquarie service centre and the almighty Maccas playland. But more importantly, frozen Coke. Home in 355km, Hâ€¦ https://t.co/YnSZzjN0Vt
About to begin the journey home. Coffee from the Artisti HQ (what else, when in Coffs). Then 427km to home.
Coffs Harbour! Finally! That felt like a long trip. The "are we there yet?" began at 7:45am. Now to find dinner for all...
Quick stop at Ferry Park for the little grumpy hungry one to have some milk. One hour or so til Coffs - 92km.
Tweed Heads for lunch - was hoping for Ballina, but this will do. Subway then back in the car I think; too hot out here. Coffs in 290km.
@MattHope4 thanks for the tip! Will try and do so if the napping children permit it! ðŸ˜
Grabbing some bakery treats, another FW from Humdrum (amazing @ClandestinoRoas coffee), and then onwards - 504km to Coffs.
First stop off at Eumundi - a little later than hoped. I say it everytime, but I adore this little town.
Homeward bound. One final stop off at Minimalist for the best coffee in the Bay... and then onwards to Coffs for the night - 684km.
@riskybusiness you need to take a hard look at yourself for that.
As if the #B12hr needed more star power. This is pretty huge. Gonna be incredible this year! https://t.co/CD3Wv7NZhj
@DTTALK can tick that one off the bingo card now.
@slezzels it is just the health tracking from my @Pebble smartwatch.
@goldenskye you can't get Pebbles anymore unfortunately - they went under. But Fitbit are probably a better option for the health tracking.
@goldenskye but I settled down after a while and now it's just something I check every day or so.
@goldenskye yeah I did a little when they first launched it (it's a smartwatch initially, then they added health about a year ago).
@stayz from my position, I did business with *you* - I paid money to you as a business, and you were making it near impossible to refund it.
@stayz Have no idea, and I really donâ€™t care. You made it so difficult and that was disappointing. Itâ€™s between you and him now.
Enjoying some amazing piccolos while I watch & listen to the coffee being roasted. ðŸ‘ŒðŸ» https://t.co/7ObbNrnGkF
@katesol @stayz yup, booked one property there and it was a breeze. Think that's where I'll focus from now on.
